oauth2.description: Keys and Secrets can be exchanged for Bearer Tokens that identify your requests and authenticate you with the API. Codefi Payments API uses OAuth 2 with the Client Credentials flow (defined in OAuth2.0 RFC 6749, section 4.4). To receive your access token, please [contact us](https://consensys.net/contact/). For more information on the access token, please refer to Auth0 documentation.

scopes.read:digital-currency-holders: Can read information about currencies holders
scopes.readall:digital-currency-operations: Can read information about all currencies operations
scopes.read:digital-currency-operations: Can read information about one currency operation
scopes.write:operations_resolve: Can create and resolve acquisition and redeem operations
